item.title: Joining forces for a power lift with the Army Engineers!
item.description: Watch the teamwork in action as a powerful lift is completed alongside the Army Engineers, showing skill, precision, and true collaboration.

media:content.media:title: Joining forces for a power lift with the Army Engineers!
media:content.media:description: Watch the teamwork in action as a powerful lift is completed alongside the Army Engineers, showing skill, precision, and true collaboration.

item.title: Chipping truck trapped? No problem!
item.description: Big truck, bigger problem—until we showed up. Watch how we freed this chipping truck from a tight spot.

item.title: Rollover Job Done!
item.description: Flipped, stuck, and twisted—but not for long. Another rollover handled and cleared.

item.title: Dodge Challenger: Farmer Edition… Yes, It’s Real
item.description: Not your everyday muscle car—this Dodge Challenger has been turned into a farmer’s workhorse.

item.title: Under Tension! Another Tangled Truck!
item.description: Tight spots, high stakes—watch us tackle another tangled truck rescue under serious pressure.

item.title: Non-Stop Action on the Night Shift!
item.description: When the lights go down, the real work kicks in—non-stop action keeping the night shift moving.

item.title: Cool Lift or Too Hot to Handle? You Decide!
item.description: Cool Lift or Too Hot to Handle? You Decide!

item.title: Semi Truck - Blocking Bridge Construction
item.description: A stalled semi truck creates a major obstacle during bridge construction—see how crews work to clear the way and keep the project moving.

item.title: You Got to Get Down Sometimes!
item.description: Taking a break from the usual routine—sometimes you just have to get down, have fun, and enjoy the moment.

item.title: Fog, Danger, and a Road Block
item.description: Thick fog turns an ordinary drive into a risky journey—see how sudden hazards and a roadblock put safety and quick decisions to the test.

item.title: Floating a Fire Truck!
item.description: Watch the unique challenge of moving a fire truck across water—careful planning and teamwork keep this heavy load afloat and on course.

item.title: Massive Truck Needed Help!
item.description: When a huge truck ran into trouble, it took skill, teamwork, and heavy equipment to get it moving again—see the recovery in action.

item.title: Log Truck Rollover: Massive Mess, Massive Challenge!
item.description: A loaded log truck overturns, spilling its cargo—watch the complex recovery effort to clear the mess and get the road reopened safely.

item.title: Super Load Stuck—Has Tator Met His Match?
item.description: A massive haul grinds to a halt—watch as Tator tackles one of the toughest recovery challenges yet.

item.title: Hazmat Tanker Rollover with Full Load
item.description: Emergency crews respond to a hazardous materials tanker rollover—see the precautions and teamwork required to secure the scene safely.

item.title: She Likes to Bounce a Little bit!
item.description: A lighthearted moment as the ride gets bumpy—watch the fun as every bounce brings more laughs.

item.title: Night Fishing for Cars—What’s Coming Up?
item.description: Join the adventure of pulling submerged vehicles from the water after dark—see what surprises await this time.

item.title: Wrong-Way Crash Closes Major Interstate
item.description: A serious collision caused by a wrong-way driver brings traffic to a standstill—see how first responders manage the aftermath.

item.title: We Could Barely move It!
item.description: It took all our effort to shift this massive load—watch the teamwork and problem‑solving that made it possible.

item.title: Train vs Loaded Semi!
item.description: A fully loaded semi meets a moving train—see the dramatic aftermath and the challenges of clearing the scene safely.
